fullPlaceAddress: 2821 MCGILL STREET, Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
description: LUXURY built brand new custom 2 level home + BSMT and laneway house in a phenomenal location. This home in total offers a spacious 8 bdrm, 8 bath featuring 8 zone radiant heated floors, 10 ft high ceilings, crown moldings, beautiful laminate floors & tiles, accent wall, and high end Kitchen Aide stainless steel appliances including microwave, refrigerator and dishwasher. Main kitchen has granite countertop, 6 burner conduction cook top. Wok kitchen has 4 burner gas range with griddle & convection oven. BSMT has 2 bdrm legal suite & one 1 bdrm potential suite. 'Below' measurements is for laneway house, 3 bdrm, 2 bath. School catchment: Hastings Elementary, Templeton Secondary. An alluring, high standard home that you must see!
